item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45866 - allowed for change of unicode compression across Continue records

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45964 - support for link formulas in Text Objects

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 43354 - support for evalating formulas with missing args

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45912 - fixed ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in EmbeddedObjectRefSubRecord

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45889 - fixed ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when constructing HSLF Table with a single row

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Initial support for creating hyperlinks in HSLF

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45876 - fixed BoundSheetRecord to allow sheet names longer than 31 chars

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45890 - fixed HSSFSheet.shiftRows to also update conditional formats

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45865 modified Formula Parser/Evaluator to handle cross-worksheet formulas

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Optimised the FormulaEvaluator to take cell dependencies into account

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 16936 - Initial support for whole-row cell styling

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Update hssf.extractor.ExcelExtractor to optionally output blank cells too

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Include the sheet name in the output of examples.XLS2CSVmra

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45784 - Support long chart titles in SeriesTextRecords

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45777 - Throw an exception if HSSF Footer or Header is attemped to be set too long, rather than having it break during writing out

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45844 - Addtional diagnostics for HSLF SlideShowRecordDumper

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45829 - HSSFPicture.getImageDimension() failed when DPI of image is zero

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45815 - Bit mask values in StyleTextPropAtom were not preserved across read-write

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45814 - Specify RecordType for slide show Handout (4041)

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45805 - Fixed 16-bit signed/unsigned bug in HSSFSheet.getColWidth etc

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45780 - Fixed HSSFSheet.shiftRows to also update Area refs

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45804 - Update HSMF to handle Outlook 3.0 msg files, which have a different string chunk type

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Expose the name of Named Cell Styles via HSSFCellStyle (normally held on the parent style though)

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45978 - Fixed IOOBE in Ref3DPtg.toFormulaString() due eager initialisation of SheetReferences

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Made HSSFFormulaEvaluator no longer require initialisation with sheet or row

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Extended support for cached results of formula cells

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45639 - Fixed AIOOBE due to bad index logic in ColumnInfoRecordsAggregate

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Fixed special cases of INDEX function (single column/single row, errors)

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45761 - Support for Very Hidden excel sheets in HSSF

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45738 - Initial HWPF support for Office Art Shapes

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45720 - Fixed HSSFWorkbook.cloneSheet to correctly clone sheets with drawings

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45728 - Fix for SlideShow.reorderSlide in HSLF

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Initial support for embedded movies and controls in HSLF

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45358 - signed/unsigned error when parsing 3-d area refs, performance problem evaluating area refs, and ClassCastExcecption in IF()

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support for HPBF Publisher hyperlinks, including during text extraction

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 26321 and 44958 - preserve position of ArrayRecords and TableRecords among cell value records

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Impove empty header or footer handling in HWPF HeaderStories

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Avoid NPE in hssf.usermodel.HeaderFooter when stripping fields out

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Avoid NPE in EscherBSERecord on older escher records

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Basic text extractraction support in HPBF

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Initial, low level support for Publisher files, in the form of HPBF

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45699 - Fix RowRecordsAggregate to tolerate intervening MERGEDCELLS records

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45698 - Fix LinkTable to tolerate multiple EXTERNSHEET records

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45682 - Fix for cloning of CFRecordsAggregate

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Initial support for evaluating external add-in functions like YEARFRAC

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45672 - Fix for MissingRecordAwareHSSFListener to prevent multiple LastCellOfRowDummyRecords when shared formulas are present

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45645 - Fix for HSSFSheet.autoSizeColumn() for widths exceeding Short.MAX_VALUE

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45623 - Support for additional HSSF header and footer fields, including bold and full file path

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45623 - Support stripping HSSF header and footer fields (eg page number) out of header and footer text if required

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45622 - Support stripping HWPF fields (eg macros) out of text, via Range.stripFields(text)

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : New HPSF based TextExtractor for document metadata, org.apache.poi.hpsf.extractor.HPSFPropertiesExtractor

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Properly update the array of Slide's text runs in HSLF when new text shapes are added

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45590 - Fix for Header/footer extraction for .ppt files saved in Office 2007

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Big improvement in how HWPF handles unicode text, and more sanity checking of text ranges within HWPF

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Include headers and footers int he extracted text from HWPF's WordExtractor

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Added support to HWPF for headers and footers

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Improve how HWPF deals with unicode internally. Should avoid some odd behaviour when manipulating unicode text

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45577 - Added implementations for Excel functions NOW and TODAY

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45582 - Fix for workbook streams with extra bytes trailing the EOFRecord

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45537 - Include headers and footers (of slides and notes) in the extracted text from HSLF

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45472 - Fixed incorrect default row height in OpenOffice 2.3

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44692 - HSSFPicture.resize() stretched image when there was a text next to it

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45543 - Optionally extract comment text with PowerPointExtractor, and initial hslf model support for comments

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45538 - Include excel headers and footers in the output of ExcelExtractor

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44894 - refactor duplicate logic from EventRecordFactory to RecordFactory

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support for Headers / Footers in HSLF

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44953 - Extensive fixes for data validation

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45519 - Fixed to keep datavalidation records together

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support for creating new HSLF CurrentUserAtoms

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45466 - Partial support for removing excel comments (won't work for all excel versions yet)

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45437 - Detect encrypted word documents, and throw an EncryptedDocumentException instead of a OOM

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45404 - New class, hssf.usermodel.HSSFDataFormatter, for formatting numbers and dates in the same way that Excel does

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45414 - Don't add too many UncalcedRecords to sheets with charts in them

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45398 - Support detecting date formats containing "am/pm" as date times

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45410 - Removed dependency from contrib on commons beanutils,collections and lang

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : New helper, HSSFOptimiser, which handles removing duplicated font and style records, to avoid going over the limits in Excel

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45322 - Fixed NPE in HSSFSheet.autoSizeColumn() when cell number format was not found

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45380 - Missing return keyword in ArrayPtg.toFormulaString()

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 44958 - Record level support for Data Tables. (No formula parser support though)

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 35583 - Include a version class, org.apache.poi.Version, to allow easy introspection of the POI version

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Allow the cloning of one HSSFCellStyle onto another, including cloning styles from one HSSFWorkbook onto another

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45289 - finished support for special comparison operators in COUNTIF

item.title: fix

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Fix cell.getRichStringCellValue() for formula cells with string results

item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45365 - Handle more excel number formatting rules in FormatTrackingHSSFListener / XLS2CSVmra

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45373 - Improve the performance of HSSFSheet.shiftRows

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45367 - Fixed bug when last row removed from sheet is row zero

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45348 - Tweaks to RVA formula logic

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45354 - Fixed recognition of named ranges within formulas

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45338 - Fix HSSFWorkbook to give you the same HSSFFont every time, and then fix it to find newly added fonts

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45336 - Fix HSSFColor.getTripletHash()

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45334 - Fixed formula parser to handle dots in identifiers

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45252 - Improvement for HWPF Range.replaceText()

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45001 - Further fix for HWPF Range.delete() and unicode characters

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45175 - Support for variable length operands in org.apache.poi.hwpf.sprm.SprmOperation

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : Avoid spurious missing lines with the MissingRecordAware event code, and odd files that contain RowRecords in the middle of the cell Records.

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Support for parsing formulas during EventUserModel processing, via the new EventWorkbookBuilder
